LanguageData.SettingTooltipDebugBabySafety: Enable writing to log all the debug info for adults trying to "take baby to safety". Be warned, this will dump vast quantities of text into your log. Only turn on if you really need it.
LanguageData.SettingTooltipCustomRenderer: Custom (minor) animations for crawling babies, wiggling, wobbling, etc. Turn off if you are having a compatibility issue with other mods that affect rendering.
LanguageData.SettingTooltipCanDraftToddlers: Toddlers remain incapable of violence, but with this setting on they can be drafted and given orders.
LanguageData.SettingLabelCareAboutBedtime: Pawns care about babies' Sleep schedue
LanguageData.SettingTooltipCareAboutBedtime: Pawns will return babies/toddlers to their cribs when they're scheduled to Sleep.
LanguageData.SettingLabelCareAboutFloorSleep: Pawns care about babies sleeping on floor
LanguageData.SettingTooltipCareAboutFloorSleep: Pawns will return babies/toddlers to their cribs if they notice them sleeping on the floor.
LanguageData.SettingLabelFeedCapableToddlers: Pawns feed toddlers who could feed themselves
LanguageData.SettingTooltipFeedCapableToddlers: Pawns will feed toddlers even if they are able to feed themselves.
LanguageData.SettingTooltipFeedingMakesMess: Toddlers feeding themselves or being fed makes mess (less in the latter case).
LanguageData.SettingTooltipBabyTalk: Whether toddler thoughts should be translated to "goo goo ba gee".
LanguageData.ApparelSettingTooltipNoBabyApparel: Babies and toddlers must go naked.
LanguageData.ApparelSettingTooltipNoTribal: Onesies are a medieval tech. Tribal babies go naked.
LanguageData.ApparelSettingTooltipAllTribal: Baby clothes including onesies require no tech.
LanguageData.ApparelSettingTooltipBabyTribalwear: Baby tribalwear for tribals, onesies for medieval and up.
LanguageData.ApparelSettingTooltipAnyChildApparel: Babies can wear any apparel children can.
LanguageData.MoveMessageSettingTooltipNone: Never receive messages about adults deciding to move babies
LanguageData.MoveMessageSettingTooltipDanger: Receive messages when adults move babies for medical or temperature reasons.
LanguageData.MoveMessageSettingTooltipDangerAndUnknow: Receive messages when adults move babies for medical or temperature reasons, and when the AI is unsure why it's moving the baby. (It helps the developer out if you report these instances.)
LanguageData.MoveMessageSettingTooltipUnknown: Receive messages when adults move babies and the AI isn't sure why. (It helps the developer out if you report these instances.)
LanguageData.MoveMessageSettingTooltipAll: Receive messages whenever an adult decides to move a baby or return them to their bed.
LanguageData.SettingTooltipPlayFallFactor: How fast the Play need falls
LanguageData.SettingTooltipLonelinessFactor: Controls how often toddlers need adult attention. Turn it up for more attention needed and down for less.
LanguageData.SettingLabelTimeToLearn: Time to fully learn (as a % of the toddler lifestage)
